|----------------|-------------|--------------------------------------|

Explanation:

The paragraph mentions one person, Chad Hurley. As he is referred to by his personal name and there is no indication of any other nationality, we can assume that Chad Hurley is an American. This information is based on the content of the paragraph and general knowledge, as there is no explicit statement of his nationality in the text.

| Person | Company | Whether the Person owns or is the leader of the Company |
